text:
Genetics manipulations had been discover recently. Scientist use it in purpose to modify organism and create GMO. Those manipulations consist on DNA’s modification.
            First, they have to control gene’s expression. They rather can overexpress gene or underexpress it. Enzyme are use to cut the dna sequence and micro-organism can be use as a vector to insert new dna fragment. When new fragment dna are insert inside a gene, new protein or inhibition of the gene expression can result.
            Changement in DNA’s sequence lead to various modification such cell work and function. This technology have been use for years now most of the time for alimentation and industry. Thanks to genetic manipulation, compagny can improve their food quality. They also work on many different aspect such as health resistance. Nowaday, big farm use those manipulation to create one year only plants. In that way, farmers have to buy new plants every year
In my opinion genetics manipulation are good. Despite, it has to be control so people with negatif intention can not do whatever they want. I think it’s a big discovery for the food gap world go throw nowaday. It’s harder to juged when it’s about modify baby in purpose to create the « perfect one ». Even if genetics manipulation are a good thing, they have to be control and restricted to plants. This technology could be a major help to fight against hunger in the world as well as against climate changements.
